Dies ist ein kleiner Webdienst, der es A: This is a simple webservice, allowing applications to access multiple Icinga2 instances and their APIs over a single server
Anwendungen können sich dabei per OAuth2: Applications are authenticated with OAuth2, Basic-Auth or simple cookie authentication.
Entwickelt wurde dieser Dienst, um einen: This service was developed as a dependency for the Icinga2 Alexa skill. Alexa skills cannot be configured by the end user other than account linking, so this service was needed.
